attributes.action: Pass legislation preventing MPs with Scottish constituencies from voting at Westminster on issues which will not take effect in their own Scottish constituncy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently Scottish MPs in the Westminster Parliament are able to vote on legislation which will have no effect on the constituents they represent but can influence the Parliamentary vote. 
This is anti-democratic and constitutionally unacceptable. No Westminster MP should be allowed to participate in a vote in the Lower House which will not directly bind by legislation the people in that MP's constituency.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
